name: MightyRCActivitySkill
0:
”Alexa, turn on Watch Movie”
”Alexa, turn off Watch Movie”
”Alexa, turn on Reading”
skdetail:
Smart Home Skill. This skill may share device information with Amazon. Learn more.
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
des: Download the MightyRC app and connect to the MightyRC(hardware), you should have create your MightyRC account. Connect your MightyRC account to your Amazon account, and then you cloud start to use Alexa to control the activities which you setting in the MightyRC.
